oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Court House Day, Nashville, Tennessee, 1982
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Pictured: Several people with Jim Varney (on right wearing a Purity Dairies cap) who is best known for his portrayal of “Ernest,” the spokesman for Purity Dairies, at the 1982 Courthouse Day hosted in Nashville, Tennessee. This civic event took place during the mayorship of Richard Fulton, the 64th Mayor of Nashville, Tennessee, who served in office from 1975-1987. Forms part of the Kolleen Hudgins, Director of Special Events, Mayor’s Office Collection. 1 b & w photograph.
